嘳嘳嘳
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 喟
Связанный символ (и): 喟

嘳字的基本解释

嘳
kuì
古同“喟”，叹息。
讥讽。
哀怜。

嘳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuì］
［《廣韻》丘愧切，去至，溪。］
［《廣韻》苦怪切，去怪，溪。］
(1)同“喟”。叹声。
(2)同“喟”。叹息。参见“嘳息”。
(3)哀怜。

嘳字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嘳； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页207第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?苦怪切，音蒯。【說文】本作?，太息也。【晏子·雜篇】嘳然而歎。【集韻】或作㕟。　又【廣韻】譏他人也。　又【集韻】呼怪切，音?。【字林】息憐也。【揚子·方言】嘳，憐也，沅灃之原，凡言相憐哀謂之嘳。【集韻】或作喟。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?丘媿切，音䰎。【廣韻】與喟同。詳前喟字註。

嘳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嘳字的起名意思

暂无。

嘳
Basic explanation of words
嘳
kuì
Gu Tong "喟", sighed.
ridicule.
pity.
嘳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuì］
["Guangyun" Qiu Qiqi, go to, stream. ]
["Guangyun" is bitter and strange, go to blame, Xi. ]
(1) Same as "喟". Sigh.
(2) Same as "喟". sigh. See "Bai Xi".
(3) Pity.
嘳
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嘳; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 207 No. 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's bitter and strange, and the sound is Kuai. [Said the text] This work? Tai Xi also. 【Yanzi·Miscellaneous Articles】He sighed. [Ji Yun] Or as 㕟.　[Guangyun] ridicule others.　[Jiyun] Calling strange, sound?. 【Word Lin】Relieve pity. 【Yangtze Dialect】Bai, pity, Yuanfeng’s original, common words, pity and mourning are called 嘳. [Ji Yun] Or make a song.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Qiu is ashamed, the sound is Ji. 【Guangyun】Same as 喟. Please refer to the previous word note.
嘳
